main event: Multiple UFO sightings were reported in Tucson, Arizona and Little Rock, Arkansas in the 1950s, including disc-shaped objects, bright white formations, and glowing circular objects flying in the sky.
interesting points: A woman in Little Rock reported observing a silver disc-shaped object moving silently and rapidly in a northerly direction, capturing a photograph of the object with her personal camera.
Witnesses in Tucson, Arizona, Mr. & Mrs. J. M. Jordan, reported seeing glowing, circular, and flying objects in formation for approximately 20 minutes.

The Air Force investigation included witness sketches and photographs, but some inconsistencies were noted between eyewitness descriptions and attached photographs, leading to doubts about the sightings.

Unidentified flying objects were also observed in the Tripoli, Libya area, with reports from military personnel and civilians, describing brilliant and illuminated objects moving silently and disappearing swiftly.
The reports often relied primarily on eyewitness accounts, with some witnesses being considered unreliable due to character or lack of training qualifications.
sighted object: varying from disc-shaped objects to glowing circular formations
location: Tucson, Arizona and Little Rock, Arkansas
witnesses: civilians, military personnel, and unreliable witnesses
photographs: yes, the reports included eyewitness photographs and sketches
